All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.pool.ObjectPool
public class CassandraClientJndiResourcePool
extends org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool

Creates a pool of CassandraClient suitable for use in application servers such as Apache Tomcat.

Author:
Perry Hoekstra (dutchman_mn@charter.net)
See Also:
GenericObjectPool
